main event: A UFO observation was reported at Kadena Air Base, Okinawa, on September 3-7, 1950, involving one object that appeared to be a rocket or missile before moving erratically and disappearing behind a cloud.
interesting points: The observation lasted approximately 1 minute,Descriptions were gathered from control tower operators,The object's course changed approximately 180 degrees,No physical evidence or photographs were obtained for this sighting,The report suggests the object could have been misidentified as a star-like satellite.
sighted object: one object initially appearing as a rocket or missile, then moving erratically
witness description: Descriptions obtained from control tower operators
